root.name: MX vs. ATV Untamed
root.description: MX vs. ATV Untamed is the 7th in the MX vs. ATV series. It came out for Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, PSP and DS. Characters MX Riders Billy Laninovich Josh Hill Chad Reed Ben Fairhall Davi Millsaps Ryan Villopoto Ivan Tedesco Nathan Ramsey Josh Grant Jordan Perazzoli Grant Langston Ricky Carmichael ATV Riders Keith Little Kory Ellis Harold Goodman Mark Kendall Dustin Wimmer Jason Luburgh John Natalie Jr. Jason Dunkelberger Pat Brown Dana Creech Soundtrack Cold - Crossfade On Edge - Authority Zero Side of a Bullet - Nickelback 12:34 - Authority Zero Dinosaurs Will Die - NOFX Social Suicide - Bad Religion Soulcrusher - Operator Hearts and Stars - Cage 9 Disconnect - Pennywise Shapeshifter - Celldweller Loose - Primer 55 Guarded - Disturbed Face Down - The Red Jumpsuit Apparatus Kwad Up - Kasper High of 75 - Relient K General Admission - Mower Collapse - Saosin Happy? - Mudvayne I Don't Like You - Electric Six Secret Weapon - MXPX The Ripper - The Used House Of Wolves - My Chemical Romance Lobotomy For Dummies - Zebrahead

similar_games.game: MX vs. ATV: On the Edge
